definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: Sigurdur Gudmundsson is one of Iceland's most international artists.
sentences.chinese: 思故都是冰島最國際化的藝術家之一。

sentences.english: The beauty of the old capital was a vivid and living compensation .
sentences.chinese: 故都的美對於我是一種豐富多彩，生動有趣的補償。

sentences.english: The discovery occurred in anyang, Henan Province, which was the capital city of the Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 發現地是河南省安陽，那裏是當年殷商的故都。

sentences.english: Dear Jiang teacher, you can contributed to China's Shaanxi Xian claims?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的江教員，您能來中國的故都陝西西安做客呢？

sentences.english: Biography for Zhuanxu Gaoyang ancient capital, only eight years old.
sentences.chinese: 高陽縣傳爲顓頊故都，八才舊裏。

definition: provisional capital of a country (e.g. in time of war)/secondary capital/alternative capital
old name of Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1]
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
Haojing (in modern Shaanxi, northwest of Chang'an county), capital of Western Zhou from c. 1050 BC
